description.value:
Elbow-Length gauntlet of interlocking adamantine and ceramite plates, contains laser cutters, bio-solvents, injectors, shears, and flensing instruments. Used to Maintain servitors. Grants +10 to Medicae, Interrogation, and Intimidation Tests. Can also be used as a weapon (Melee; 1d5+5 R, Tearing, Toxic)

Requirements

Used by Techmarines and Apothacarys

Effect: Distinguished

Notes: 35 R
